sourcing.instructions: Aluminum can be sourced from metal supply stores or online suppliers. Boron may be found at chemical supply companies. Cobalt and Nickel can be sourced from metal suppliers or specialty online retailers. Yttrium is available at chemical suppliers or online specialty materials stores.
steps: Aluminum can be sourced from metal supply stores or online suppliers. Boron may be found at chemical supply companies. Cobalt and Nickel can be sourced from metal suppliers or specialty online retailers. Yttrium is available at chemical suppliers or online specialty materials stores.
1. Measure out the required amounts of each material using an analytical scale.

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally (approximately 4-6 hours).
